summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jeffrey Epstein and Lesley Groff regarding a meeting scheduled with Paul Morris and other individuals from the Key Clients Partners Group. The email discusses the logistics of the meeting and includes a request for additional attendees.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting involving Jeffrey Epstein and Paul Morris, along with other members of the Key Clients Partners Group.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the main recipient of the email, requesting to meet with Paul Morris's team.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is mentioned as a participant in the upcoming meeting and is asked to suggest additional attendees.

persons.name: Caroline Kididis
persons.context: Caroline Kididis is identified as the head of the Key Clients Partners Group and is scheduled to attend the meeting.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is mentioned as the Director of the Key Clients Partners Group and is also scheduled to attend the meeting.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is coordinating a meeting with Paul Morris and his team.
Paul Morris is associated with Caroline Kididis, who leads the Key Clients Partners Group.
Paul Morris is associated with Tazia Smith, who is the Director of the Key Clients Partners Group.

events.title: Scheduled Meeting
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for September 6th at 10 AM with Paul Morris, Caroline Kididis, and Tazia Smith.

keyFacts: The email discusses a meeting scheduled for September 6, 2013.
Lesley Groff is coordinating the meeting and is in communication with Jeffrey Epstein.
Caroline Kididis and Tazia Smith are both part of the Key Clients Partners Group and are attending the meeting.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses a desire to meet with all of Paul Morris's team.
